name: IT201_Project2_Jennifer_Medrano
description: This project is a beta game for "avoid the enemies". The player must avoid all enemies in green before they come to life (This will be introduced later on). The player is slow and sensitive to the sun. He/she will be able to create temporary clouds as protection. These clouds will auto-delete after 4 seconds. The user will also be able to change the color of the clouds and they will be able to see the position of the mouse at all times. The play can also rotate the sun as fast as possible to create fire to destroy the enemies at once (This will be introduced later on).  The Player’s life is now visible by default and can be hidden by pressing the letter ‘h’ on the keyboard. The player can also create stars in the sky aid purposes by pressing the letter ‘w’ on the keyboard. the Time is now also integrated in the game to later control more features, Music is also introduced in this beta version to calm the player.
